passage.title: Mike is a bird!
passage.paragraph: "I want to go to school," says Kim. "I want to see Mike." Mike is not Kim's friend. Mike is a bird!

One day, the children are at school. It is very hot and the windows are open. A bird comes into the school. The children give it some food. Soon the bird becomes the children's pet. They name it "Mike".
Now they open a window each morning. The bird comes into the school. It stays all day. Mike likes staying in school with the children.
